list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (especially of a person) thinking about or planning the future with imagination or wisdom.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một nhà lãnh đạo tầm nhìn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: relating to or able to see visions in a dream or trance, or as a supernatural apparition.
a person with original ideas about what the future will or could be like.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he is a visionary keen on policy-making
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy là một người quan tâm về chính sách
